fullTextsDoctor: Attention unidentified spaceship, this is NASA Mission Control. You have entered Earth's orbit. Please tell us who you are and why you're here immediately.
Aquaferia? That's not a planet we're familiar with. Can you tell us where it is compared to our solar system?
Understood, E-626. For better communication, may we connect directly with your main computer?
fullTextsAlien: Greetings, people of Earth! I am E-626 from the planet Aquaferia. I come in peace, seeking knowledge about your PACE project to help my home world.

My planet is many light-years away, in a distant part of the galaxy. We've been watching your work in studying the environment and believe your PACE project could help us solve important problems on Aquaferia.
Yes, please! I'm eager to learn and share information.

fullTextsDoctor: Attention unidentified spacecraft, this is NASA Mission Control. You have entered restricted Earth orbit. Please identify yourself and state your intentions immediately.
Aquaferia? That's not a planet we're familiar with. Can you specify your location in relation to our solar system?
Understood, E-626. For a more secure and clear communication, may we establish a direct link with your main computer?
fullTextsAlien: Greetings, representatives of Earth. I am E-626 from the planet Aquaferia. I come in peace, seeking knowledge about your PACE project to assist my home world.

My planet resides many light-years away, in a distant sector of the galaxy. We have observed your efforts in environmental science and believe your PACE project could help us address critical issues on Aquaferia.
Permission granted. I am eager to learn and share information.

fullTextsDoctor: Attention unidentified spacecraft, this is NASA Mission Control. You have entered a restricted Earth orbit. Please identify yourself and state your intentions immediately.
Aquaferia? That is not a celestial body known to us. Could you specify your location relative to our solar system?
Acknowledged, E-626. To facilitate secure and efficient communication, may we establish a direct data link with your main computer system?
fullTextsAlien: Salutations, representatives of Earth. I am E-626 from the planet Aquaferia. I come in peace, seeking knowledge about your PACE mission to aid my home planet.

My planet is situated many light-years away, in a distant sector of the galaxy. We have been observing your advancements in environmental science and believe that your PACE mission could assist us in addressing critical challenges on Aquaferia.
Permission granted. I am eager to exchange knowledge and information.
